title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Kushner's Senate Interview (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Kushner's Senate Interview (Audio)
description:
Renato Mariotti, a partner at Thompson Coburn, and Andrew Wright, a professor at Savannah Law School, discuss Jared Kushner's interview with the Senate Intelligence Committee on Monday, during which the White House adviser said he did not collude with Russia during the election. They speak with Michael Best and June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
